0 or
11 any
22 other
33 table
44 lookup
55 structure
66 For
77 this
88 reason
99 they
230 are
253 widely
276 used
299 in
322 many
345 kinds
368 of
391 computer
414 software
893 particularly
940 for
987 associative
1034 arrays
1081 database
1128 indexing
1175 caches
1222 and
1269 sets
1316 Hash
1363 function
1410 The
1457 idea
1504 of
1551 hashing
1598 is
1645 to
1692 distribute
3589 the
3686 entries
3783 key
3880 value
3977 pairs
4074 across
4171 an
4268 array
4365 of
4462 buckets
4559 Given
4656 a
4753 key
4850 the
4947 algorithm
5044 computes
5141 an
5238 index
5335 that
5432 suggests
5529 where
5626 the
5723 entry
5820 can
5917 be
6014 found
6111 index
6208 fkey
6305 array
6402 size
6499 Often
6596 this
6693 is
6790 done
6887 in
6984 two
7081 steps
14578 hash
14775 hashfunckey
14972 index
15169 hash
15366 array
15563 size
15760 In
15957 this
16154 method
16351 the
16548 hash
16745 is
16942 independent
17139 of
17336 the
17533 array
17730 size
17927 and
18124 it
18321 is
18518 then
18715 reduced
18912 to
19109 an
19306 index
19503 a
19700 number
19897 between
20094 0
20291 and
20488 array
20685 size
20882 1
21079 using
21276 the
21473 modulo
21670 operator
21867 In
22064 the
22261 case
22458 that
22655 the
22852 array
23049 size
23246 is
23443 a
23640 power
23837 of
24034 two
24231 the
24428 remainder
24625 operation
24822 is
25019 reduced
25216 to
25413 masking
25610 which
25807 improves
26004 speed
26201 but
26398 can
26595 increase
26792 problems
26989 with
27186 a
27383 poor
27580 hash
27777 function
27974 Choosing
28171 a
28368 good
28565 hash
28762 function
28959 A
29156 good
59153 hash
59550 function
59947 and
60344 implementation
60741 algorithm
61138 are
61535 essential
61932 for
62329 good
62726 hash
63123 table
63520 performance
63917 but
64314 may
64711 be
65108 difficult
65505 to
65902 achieve
66299 A
66696 basic
67093 requirement
67490 is
67887 that
68284 the
68681 function
69078 should
69475 provide
69872 a
70269 uniform
70666 distribution
71063 of
71460 hash
71857 values
72254 A
72651 non
73048 uniform
73445 distribution
73842 increases
74239 the
74636 number
75033 of
75430 collisions
75827 and
76224 the
76621 cost
77018 of
77415 resolving
77812 them
78209 Uniformity
78606 is
79003 sometimes
79400 difficult
79797 to
80194 ensure
80591 by
80988 design
81385 but
81782 may
82179 be
82576 evaluated
82973 empirically
83370 using
83767 statistical
84164 tests
84561 eg
84958 a
85355 Pearsons
85752 chi
86149 squared
86546 test
86943 for
87340 discrete
87737 uniform
88134 distributions56
88531 The
88928 distribution
89325 needs
89722 to
90119 be
90516 uniform

91310 for
91707 table
92104 sizes
92501 that
92898 occur
93295 in
93692 the
94089 application
94486 In
94883 particular
95280 if

96074 uses
96471 dynamic

97265 with
97662 exact
98059 doubling
98456 and
98853 halving
99250 of
99647 the
100044 table
100441 size
100838 s
101235 then

103617 be
104014 uniform

105602 is
105999 a
106396 power
106793 of
107190 two

108381 other

110763 uniform

111557 only
111954 when
112351 s
112748 is
113145 a
113542 prime
113939 number7
114336 For
114733 open
115130 addressing
115527 schemes
115924 the

116718 function
117115 should
117512 also
117909 avoid
118306 clustering
238303 the
239100 mapping
239897 of
240694 two

242288 more
243085 keys
243882 to
244679 consecutive
245476 slots
246273 Such
247070 clustering
247867 may
248664 cause
249461 the
250258 lookup
251055 cost

252649 skyrocket
253446 even
254243 if
255040 the
255837 load
256634 factor
257431 is
258228 low
259025 and
259822 collisions
260619 are
261416 infrequent
262213 The
263010 popular
263807 multiplicative
264604 hash3
265401 is
266198 claimed
266995 to
267792 have
268589 particularly
269386 poor
270183 clustering
270980 behavior7
271777 Cryptographic
272574 hash
273371 functions
274168 are
274965 believed
275762 to
276559 provide
277356 good
278153 hash
278950 functions
279747 for
280544 any
281341 table
282138 size
282935 s
283732 either

285326 modulo

288514 bit

291702 also
292499 be
293296 appropriate

294890 there
295687 is
296484 a
297281 risk
298078 of
298875 malicious
299672 users
300469 trying
301266 to
302063 sabotage
302860 a
303657 network
304454 service
305251 by
306048 submitting
306845 requests
307642 designed
308439 to
309236 generate
310033 a
310830 large
311627 number
312424 of
313221 collisions
314018 in
314815 the
315612 servers
316409 hash
317206 tables
318003 However
318800 the
319597 risk
320394 of
321191 sabotage
321988 can
322785 also
323582 be
324379 avoided
325176 by
325973 cheaper
326770 methods
327567 such
328364 as
329161 applying

332349 to
333146 the
333943 data
334740 or

336334 a
337131 universal

338725 function

340319 hash
341116 function

342710 all

344304 are
345101 known
345898 ahead
346695 of
347492 time

352274 be

359447 has
360244 no
361041 collisions

362635 minimal

365026 is
365823 used

367417 location
368214 in
369011 the
369808 hash

372199 be
372996 used
373793 as
374590 well

376184 hashing
376981 allows
377778 for
378575 constant
379372 time
380169 lookups
380966 in
381763 the
382560 worst

384154 This
384951 is

388139 most

392124 methods

396109 lookup

404876 to
405673 the

407267 of
408064 entries
408861 for
409658 some
410455 sets
411252 of
412049 keys
412846 Key
413643 statistics
414440 A
415237 critical
416034 statistic
416831 for
417628 a
418425 hash
419222 table
420019 is
420816 called
421613 the
422410 load
423207 factor
424004 This
424801 is
425598 simply
426395 the
427192 number
427989 of
428786 entries
429583 divided
430380 by
431177 the
431974 number
432771 of
433568 buckets
434365 that
435162 is
435959 n
436756 k
437553 where
438350 n
439147 is
439944 the
440741 number
441538 of
442335 entries
443132 and
443929 k
444726 is
445523 the
446320 number
447117 of
447914 buckets
448711 If
449508 the
450305 load
451102 factor
451899 is
452696 kept
453493 reasonable
454290 the
455087 hash
455884 table
456681 should
457478 perform
458275 well
459072 provided
459869 the
460666 hashing
461463 is
462260 good
463057 If
463854 the
464651 load
465448 factor
466245 grows
467042 too
467839 large
468636 the
469433 hash
470230 table
471027 will
471824 become
472621 slow
473418 or
474215 it
475012 may
475809 fail
476606 to
956603 work
958200 depending
959797 on
961394 the
962991 method
964588 used
966185 The
967782 expected
969379 constant
970976 time
972573 property
974170 of
975767 a
977364 hash
978961 table
980558 assumes
982155 that
983752 the
985349 load
986946 factor
988543 is
990140 kept
991737 below
993334 some
994931 bound
996528 For
998125 a
999722 fixed
1001319 number
1002916 of
1004513 buckets
1006110 the
1007707 time
1009304 for
1010901 a
1012498 lookup
1014095 grows
1015692 with
1017289 the
1018886 number
1020483 of
1022080 entries
1023677 and
1025274 so
1026871 does
1028468 not
1030065 achieve
1031662 the
1033259 desired
1034856 constant
1036453 time
1038050 Second
1039647 to
1041244 that
1042841 one
1044438 can
1046035 examine
1047632 the
1049229 variance
1050826 of
1052423 number
1054020 of
1055617 entries
1057214 per
1058811 bucket
1060408 For
1062005 example
1063602 two
1065199 tables
1066796 both
1068393 have
1069990 1000
1071587 entries
1073184 and
1074781 1000
1076378 buckets
1077975 one
1079572 has
1081169 exactly
1082766 one
1084363 entry
1085960 in
1087557 each
1089154 bucket
1090751 the
1092348 other
1093945 has
1095542 all
1097139 entries
1098736 in
1100333 the
1101930 same
1103527 bucket
1105124 Clearly
1106721 the
1108318 hashing
1109915 is
1111512 not
1113109 working
1114706 in
1116303 the
1117900 second
1119497 one
1121094 A
1122691 low
1124288 load
1125885 factor
1127482 is
1129079 not
1130676 especially
1132273 beneficial
1133870 As
1135467 the
1137064 load
1138661 factor
1140258 approaches
1141855 0
1143452 the
1145049 proportion
1146646 of
1148243 unused
1149840 areas
1151437 in
1153034 the
1154631 hash
1156228 table
1157825 increases
1159422 but
1161019 there
1162616 is
1164213 not
1165810 necessarily
1167407 any
1169004 reduction
1170601 in
1172198 search
1173795 cost
1175392 This
1176989 results
1178586 in
1180183 wasted
1181780 memory
1183377 Collision
1184974 resolution
1186571 Hash
1188168 collisions
1189765 are
1191362 practically
1192959 unavoidable
1194556 when
1196153 hashing
1197750 a
1199347 random
1200944 subset
1202541 of
1204138 a
1205735 large
1207332 set
1208929 of
1210526 possible
1212123 keys
1213720 For
1215317 example
1216914 if
1218511 2
1220108 450
1221705 keys
1223302 are
1224899 hashed
1226496 into
1228093 a
1229690 million
1231287 buckets
1232884 even
1234481 with
1236078 a
1237675 perfectly
1239272 uniform
1240869 random
1242466 distribution
1244063 according
1245660 to
1247257 the
1248854 birthday
1250451 problem
1252048 there
1253645 is
1255242 approximately
1256839 a
1258436 95
1260033 chance
1261630 of
1263227 at
1264824 least
1266421 two
1268018 of
1269615 the
1271212 keys
1272809 being
1274406 hashed
1276003 to
1277600 the
1279197 same
1280794 slot
1282391 Therefore
1283988 most
1285585 hash
1287182 table
1288779 implementations
1290376 have
1291973 some
1293570 collision
1295167 resolution
1296764 strategy
1298361 to
1299958 handle
1301555 such
1303152 events
1304749 Some
1306346 common
1307943 strategies
1309540 are
1311137 described
1312734 below
1314331 All
1315928 these
1317525 methods
1319122 require
1320719 that
1322316 the
1323913 keys
1325510 or
1327107 pointers
1328704 to
1330301 them
1331898 be
1333495 stored
1335092 in
1336689 the
1338286 table
1339883 together
1341480 with
1343077 the
1344674 associated
1346271 values
1347868 Separate
1349465 chaining
1351062 Hash
1352659 collision
1354256 resolved
1355853 by
1357450 separate
1359047 chaining
1360644 In
1362241 the
1363838 method
1365435 known
1367032 as
1368629 separate
1370226 chaining
1371823 each
1373420 bucket
1375017 is
1376614 independent
1378211 and
1379808 has
1381405 some
1383002 sort
1384599 of
1386196 list
1387793 of
1389390 entries
1390987 with
1392584 the
1394181 same
1395778 index
1397375 The
1398972 time
1400569 for
1402166 hash
1403763 table
1405360 operations
1406957 is
1408554 the
1410151 time
1411748 to
1413345 find
1414942 the
1416539 bucket
1418136 which
1419733 is
1421330 constant
1422927 plus
1424524 the
1426121 time
1427718 for
1429315 the
1430912 list
1432509 operation
1434106 The
1435703 technique
1437300 is
1438897 also
1440494 called
1442091 open
1443688 hashing
1445285 or
1446882 closed
1448479 addressing
1450076 In
1451673 a
1453270 good
1454867 hash
1456464 table
1458061 each
1459658 bucket
1461255 has
1462852 zero
1464449 or
1466046 one
1467643 entries
1469240 and
1470837 sometimes
1472434 two
1474031 or
1475628 three
1477225 but
1478822 rarely
1480419 more
1482016 than
1483613 that
1485210 Therefore
1486807 structures
1488404 that
1490001 are
1491598 efficient
1493195 in
1494792 time
1496389 and
1497986 space
1499583 for
1501180 these
1502777 cases
1504374 are
1505971 preferred
1507568 Structures
1509165 that
1510762 are
1512359 efficient
1513956 for
1515553 a
1517150 fairly
1518747 large
1520344 number
1521941 of
1523538 entries
1525135 per
1526732 bucket
1528329 are
1529926 not
1531523 needed
1533120 or
1534717 desirable
1536314 If
1537911 these
1539508 cases
1541105 happen
1542702 often
1544299 the
1545896 hashing
1547493 is
1549090 not
1550687 working
1552284 well
1553881 and
1555478 this
1557075 needs
1558672 to
1560269 be
1561866 fixed
1563463 Separate
1565060 chaining
1566657 with
1568254 linked
1569851 lists
1571448 Chained
1573045 hash
1574642 tables
1576239 with
1577836 linked
1579433 lists
1581030 are
1582627 popular
1584224 because
1585821 they
1587418 require
1589015 only
1590612 basic
1592209 data
1593806 structures
1595403 with
